Welcome to the Skunkware 7 X11 Servers section. The Skunkware team hopes to add to this section in the future.

Package List

Name Description Version OSR5 UnixWare
xfree86 XFree 86 X11 Server 3.3.1 Yes No

XFree86 X11 Server

This is a binary only version of XFree86 3.3.1. This is the first port of XFree86 to SCO Open Server, and is considered very experimental.

To extract this file, perform the following steps, as root: 

  # cd /usr
  # gzcat xfree86-3.3.1.OSR5.tar.gz | tar xvf -

Then set your PATH to include /usr/X11R6/bin *BEFORE* any other X11 related directories, and then simply run XF86Setup to set it all up. Please report any problems with this package directly to me, jkj@sco.com.

http://skunkware.dev/skunkware/osr5/x11/xfree86/

 

The Santa Cruz Operation, Inc. and SCO Skunkware are not related to, affiliated with or licensed by the famous Lockheed Martin Skunk Works (R), the creator of the F-117 Stealth Fighter, SR-71, U-2, Venturestar(tm), Darkstar(tm), and other pioneering air and spacecraft.
